about.intro_text: Founded in 2015, Shenzhen Fraun Biomed Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise dedicated to biomedical research, technology introduction, and specialized services. Combining research and sourcing, Fraun Biomed strategically focuses on advanced laboratory consumables and diagnostic reagents. We provide high-quality fetal bovine serum, growth factors, serum-free media, and preclinical testing services for medical institutions, universities, and biopharmaceutical companies nationwide.

about.mission_text: To be an essential driving force for biomedical research and innovation
